about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind Caffe bar Koneti
about.intro1: If you are looking for a place where great atmosphere, the best fresh juices, and top-notch service come together, welcome to
about.intro2: Our cafe opened in 2022 and since then we have become a recognizable gathering place for lovers of quality drinks and pleasant ambiance in Novi Sad.
about.intro3: Koneti is a cafe where you will experience a blend of modern interior and the warmth of a homely atmosphere. That's why many recognize us as the
about.intro3_highlight: best caffe bar and cafe in Novi Sad,
about.intro3_rest: where every detail ‚Äì from drink selection to music ‚Äì contributes to making you feel relaxed and satisfied.
about.mission: Whether you come for morning coffee, afternoon refreshment, or evening gathering, quality and good mood always await you here.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: The best fresh juices in town and a wide selection of hot and cold beverages.

passion.title: Real Energy
passion.description: Good music and friendly staff create the perfect atmosphere for enjoyment.

community.title: Your Favorite Place
community.description: A place you'll gladly return to ‚Äì because here you always get more than just an outing.

aboutPage.welcome: ‚ú® Koneti is the place where every moment becomes special ‚Äì whether you're planning a business meeting, a celebration, or a relaxed gathering.

offer.business: Business reservations: Packages for all needs ‚Äì from quick meetings to full-day events.
offer.koneti: Koneti reservations: Perfect for celebrations and gatherings, with options including VIP treatment.

aboutPage.cta: Book your spot and let us make your moments unforgettable!

reservation.intro1_rest: ‚Äì a place where every occasion becomes a memorable moment. In the heart of Novi Sad, at Bulevar Osloboƒëenja 97, Koneti combines taste, style and emotion.
reservation.intro2: Whether you're planning a birthday, business event, or a quiet evening with loved ones, we offer an ambiance that radiates
reservation.intro2_highlight: warmth, elegance and attention to every detail.
reservation.infoIconText: Find more details about each package by clicking the info icon.

business.title: üè¢ Business Meetings & Presentations
business.description:
In the heart of Novi Sad, at Bulevar Osloboƒëenja 97, Koneti offers the perfect setting for business meetings, presentations, and agreements that deserve a refined atmosphere.

In a calm, modern environment ‚Äì with premium coffee, carefully selected bites, and discreet service ‚Äì every idea finds the right space to come to life.
business.extraInfo: Ideal solution for all your business needs in a professional environment.
